message:
SYSTEM: AMPER08_-_RDF%28S%29_access_APIs.pdf: Página 5
RDF(S) Access APIs, May 2008
5
© García-Castro, Corcho, Muñoz-García
Sesame
•
A framework for storage, querying and inferencing of RDF and RDF 
Schema
•
A Java Library for handling RDF
•
A Database Server for (remote) access to repositories of RDF data
•
Highly expressive query and transformation languages
– SeRQL, SPARQL
•
Various backends
– Native Store
– RDBMS (MySQL, Oracle 10, DB2, PostgreSQL)
– main memory
•
Reasoning support
– RDF Schema reasoner
– OWL DLP (OWLIM)
– domain reasoning (custom rule engine)
speaker: SYSTEM
